Articles.Content:
Hi, I am trying to login to the Kerbal Space Program Wiki. Except there is a problem. I’ve lost my password and unable to recover it. I’ve tried resetting password through wiki page but I didn’t get password reset email (I believe I lost a connection to KSP wiki server). But when I tried again. This appeared. 

So, in the next day. I tried again. But no email ever reach my inbox, not in junk, or any even in any other folder. I’ve checked all email in this week and a week before. Sadly, there is no mail from KSPwiki at all.

 

Are there any other way round or nothing can be done?
